dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org [mailto:Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org] 
Posted At: Thursday, June 08, 2006 5:22 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com


Legal Response Team,

        The attached letter includes MPAA members' titled content found
on the website with specific URL. Thank you and your company for
cooperating with the MPAA. 

Eddie Huang
Sr. Internet Case Coordinator
Motion Picture Association
Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org
818-995-6600 x 364


-----Original Message-----
From: Legal Response [mailto:Legal-Response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Thursday, June 08, 2006 2:36 PM
To: Huang, Eddie
Subject: FW: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com

 Mr. Huang,

Please provide us a specific URL which is infringing upon MPAA's
copyright.

Thank you in advance.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org [mailto:Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org] Posted At:
Tuesday, June 06, 2006 3:38 PM Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com


Legal Response Team:

    The links in the complaint notice were not all disable, as several
of the links are still accessible. In addition, as the letter states,
the title(s) offered included were NOT LIMITED to the list. It would be
greatly appreciated if your team can please review the website
http://www.boxedtvseries.com/catalog/index.php?cPath=28, in it's
entirely. 


Eddie Huang
Sr. Internet Case Coordinator
Motion Picture Association
Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org
818-995-6600 x 364


-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 11:56 AM
To: Huang, Eddie; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from MPAA boxedtvseries.com

To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement

Posted At: Tuesday, May 23, 2006 12:26 PM

Posted To: Copyright

Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion
Pictures]

Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures]





> Old Signed by an unknown key: 05/23/2006 at 01:26:29 PM

Hash: SHA1



For your review.



Thank you,



Policy Enforcement

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.

http://www.theplanet.com/legal/



-------- Original Message --------

Subject:         [ABUSE] Unauthorized use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures

Date:         Tue, 23 May 2006 09:57:15 -0700

From:         <Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org>

To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>







Dear General Counsel,











Attached is a Cease and Deist notice regarding
http://www.boxedtvseries.com (69.93.90.71), which is hosted by
ThePlanet.com Internet Servies.







The offending website is selling illegal copies of our members?

copyrighted motion pictures.







We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.







Please feel free to contact me if needed.











Eddie Huang



Sr. Internet Case Coordinator



Motion Picture Association



Eddie_Huang@mpaa.org



818-995-6600 x 364









* Unknown Key
* 0x9B3AA325 (L)
